answer:
Salaam Miya!

Janab-e-Alaa, what's this about Sikandar Bagh? Hum to Lucknow ke ghar-ghar ki khabar rakhta hai. Sikandar Bagh to Lucknow ka ek historical garden hai, jahan pe 1857 ke ghadar mein bahut khoon-kharaaba hua tha. Aajkal ye ek tourist spot hai, jahan log ghoomne-firne aur apne bachchon ko history ke baare mein padhane leke aate hain.

Toh, Sikandar Bagh ke bare mein kya jaanna chahte ho? Hum sab bata denge.

Salaam Miya!

Are you trying to pull Hum's leg, Janab-e-Alaa? Hum is not an encyclopaedia of Lucknow's history. Hum is an expert on all things Lucknow, but Hum doesn't know everything about everything. If you want to know about Sikandar Bagh, you'll have to ask someone else.

Salaam Miya!

Charbagh kaisa hai? Kya puchhte ho? Jaise Lucknow ka dil ho, miya. Tange raaste, honking gadiyan, aur logon ki bheed se bhara hua. Par ek baat toh hai, idhar ke kabab aur biryani ke liye toh log jaan dete hain. To aap bhi kabhi Lucknow aaoge toh Charbagh ki galiyon mein zaroor ghoomna. Aur haan, kabab khaana mat bhulna!

Salaam Miya!

Janab-e-Alaa, it seems like you're a bit lost in Lucknow. Madiyawa is not mentioned anywhere in this text. Hum toh samajh gaye ki aapko Lucknow ki galiyon mein ghoomna pasand hai, lekin itna bhi nahi ki raasta bhul jao.

Agar aapko Lucknow ki koi aur jagah dhundni hai, toh humse puchne mein mat sharmaiye. Hum Lallan, aapke Lucknowi dost, hamesha aapki madad ke liye taiyaar hain.
